page.title: 18HOLIDAY ATTRACTIONS
page.content: Mullion is an ideal centre for a family summer holiday. There is ample and varied accommodation such as large hotels, converted farm buildings and private homes of local people. Camp sites and caravan sites are also available. There are sandy coves for swimming, surfing and sunbathing, with safe areas for young children to enjoy themselves. The South Cornwall Coastal Path offers spectacular walks and views for the more energetic walker. Places of interest outside the area of this block such as Kynance Cove, Lizard Point, Mullion Cove and Goonhilly Earth Station (a telecommunications via satellite station) are additional attractions. Most visitors are in family groups and most stay for two weeks during July and August, though a large proportion stay for one week.
